chat.title: review
chat.message: This is interesting. The misoprostol doses that vary by gestational age are good. We should review the literature and evidence about this and the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of misoprostol.

chat.title: review
chat.message: Mifepristone needs to be included in this. order set. Mifepristone is standard of care. I'll get guideline and evidence together.

chat.title: placental delivery
chat.message: "notify provider if placenta retained longer than 2h" - I would change this to 1h, bleeding should be assessed by MD prior to 2h

chat.title: oxytocin
chat.message: Would add washout period between misoprostol and oxytocin in the oxytocin order

chat.title: misoprostol
chat.message:
agree, need mifegymiso protocol here

chat.title: investigations
chat.message: IUFD investigations should be added (blood work, urine, autopsy etc.)
